plot: This movie short is about six unlucky souls who find themselves trapped in an old house surrounded by zombies. Their efforts to escape are both humorous and tragic. Who lives and who dies? You have to see it for yourself.
title: The Second Death
plot_es: This movie short is about six unlucky souls who find themselves trapped in an old house surrounded by zombies. Their efforts to escape are both humorous and tragic. Who lives and who dies? You have to see it for yourself.

cast.role: 2nd Victim - Arm Ripped off by Zombies
